General.Name: Reyna Gold Corp
General.Description: Reyna Gold Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Mexico. The company explores for gold, precious, and base metals. It holds option agreements to acquire interest in the La Gloria, Don Porfirio, El Durazno, and La Centella projects. The company was formerly known as R1 Capital Corp. and changed its name to Reyna Gold Corp. in January 2021. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 595 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T5
